full_text: About Us - Ley Choon Group Home About Us Our Business Investor Relations Training Programs Career Contact Us English ‰∏≠Êñá Melayu ‡Æ§‡ÆÆ‡Æø‡Æ¥‡Øç About Us Learn about Ley Choon Group's history, vision, and leadership Corporate Profile Corporate Video Vision & Mission History & Milestones Group Structure Board of Directors Management Team Awards & Certifications Corporate Profile Ley Choon Group Holdings Limited ("Ley Choon" or the "Group") is an established one-stop underground utilities infrastructure construction and road works service provider. Since our inception as Ley Choon Constructions and Engineering Pte Ltd in 1990, we have grown our spectrum of services to encompass: 1) Underground utilities infrastructure construction and maintenance services, which include water pipes, NEWater pipes, high-pressure gas pipes, high-voltage power cables, fibre optic cables and sewer pipeline rehabilitation; 2) Road and airfield pavement construction and maintenance services, which include the supplying and laying of graded stones, cement treated base and milling and laying of asphalt premix; and 3) Construction materials supply services, which include production of asphalt premix and recycled aggregates from construction and demolition waste and production of ready mix concrete and cement bricks. As a one-stop underground utilities infrastructure construction service provider, our core strengths reside with our technical expertise in underground utilities infrastructure and the in-house supply of construction materials such as asphalt premix and recycled aggregates. Ley Choon is one of the few asphalt plant operators in Singapore. Our asphalt plant is one of the largest in Singapore with production capacity of up to 400 tonnes per hour. The built-in recycling feature and the offering of various asphalt premix formulations to meet customer requirements provide us with a competitive advantage. Our customers include Singapore government agencies such as Public Utilities Board (PUB) and Land Transport Authority (LTA), as well as reputable companies such as Changi Airport Group and SP Group. As a L6-registered contractor (the highest grade) with the Building and Construction Authority (BCA), Ley Choon can tender for Singapore's public sector contracts of unlimited value in the categories of cable/pipe-laying and road reinstatement, essential construction materials and other basic construction materials. The Group is also an A1-registered contractor in the category of civil engineering (CWO2). Leveraging on our expertise, the Group has been expanding overseas. The Group set up its first plant in China, engaging in the construction waste recycling and the development, production and sale of eco-green construction materials. Currently, the Group is undertaking a sewer pipeline rehabilitation project funded by Asian Development Bank (ADB) in Sri Lanka, and has since secured and completed a second project in FY2019. Headquartered in Singapore with headcount of around 1000, we build our technology capabilities by investing in people, process and system optimization, such as the application of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system and mobile CCTV monitoring system. As a testament to our technological advantage and service quality, Ley Choon has been accredited with IMS-ISO 9001, BS-OHSAS 18001, ISO 14001 and Green And Gracious Builder Award. Ley Choon was listed on the Main Board of Singapore Exchange Securities Trading Limited (SGX-ST) in August 2012 via a reverse takeover of Ultro Technologies Limited and transferred to the Catalist Board on 22 February 2017. üìÑ Download Corporate Brochure Corporate Video Watch our corporate video to learn more about Ley Choon Group's operations and capabilities. üìπ Corporate Video Coming Soon Vision and Mission üéØ Our Vision To be a leading one-stop regional service provider of Underground Infrastructure Construction, road and airfield construction and maintenance, asphalt premix production and construction waste recycling. üöÄ Our Mission We aim to provide timely and reliable integrated solutions while building a strong team of in-house expertise and developing advanced machinery and technology to best serve the individual needs of our customers. History & Milestones 1990 Commenced operations in pipe-laying business as a sub-contractor. Operating in small container office with a staff strength of 15. 1993 Secured contracts from Public Utilities Board ("PUB") as a main contractor for pipe-laying. Relocated head office to 61 Senoko Drive. 2002 Secured 1st NEWater contract from PUB. Ventured into cable laying business via acquisition of 100% stake in Teacly (S) Pte. Ltd. 2005 Acquired 100% stake in Chin Kuan Engineering and Contractors Pte Ltd to speed up pipe-laying expansion business. 2007 Teacly completed rehabilitation of approximately 100km of sewer pipeline network. Built first asphalt premix plant. 2008 Awarded 1st two NIP (NEWater Infrastructure Plan) projects. Diversified to airfield maintenance and construction. 2009 Secured first contract for resurfacing of taxiways from Changi Airport Group ("CAG"). Built construction waste recycling plant. 2010 Ranked 9th among Enterprise 50 (E50) Award. Secured S$31.4m contract from CAG to construct airfield at Seletar Airport. 2011 Awarded BCA's L6 contractor (highest grade), able to tender for Singapore public sector contracts of unlimited value. 2012 Listed on the mainboard of the Singapore Exchange Securities Trading Limited on August 6. Built second asphalt premix plant with capacity of 400 tons per hour. 2013 Winner of Singapore Corporate Awards (SCA) for Best Annual Report for first-year listed companies. 2015 Ley Choon enters 3rd overseas market, Sri Lanka with S$38.2 million for rehabilitation of 10 km of sewer lines within Colombo Municipal Council Area. 2016 Moved to newly constructed Corporate Head Quarters at No.3, Sungei Kadut Drive, Singapore. Our Group Structure Ley Choon Group Holdings Limited is the holding company with subsidiaries across Singapore, China, and Sri Lanka. Board of Directors Mr Toh Choo Huat Executive Chairman and Chief Executive Officer As one of the Group's founders, Mr Toh has played a pivotal role in the growth and development of the Group. He is responsible for the overall business development and general management of the Group. Mr Toh has more than 20 years of experience in the business of Underground Utilities Infrastructure construction and maintenance. Mr Ragavendran Srinivasan Executive Director, Chief Financial Officer & Dy. Chief Executive Officer Appointed as Chief Financial Officer in Jan 2021, responsible for accounting, financial reporting, treasury, management accounting, corporate compliance, taxation and other related matters of the Group. He has 25 years of diverse experience in accounting & finance. Ms Reanne Toh Ting Xuan Executive Director, Head-Tender, Contracts & Sales Responsible for the overall execution of the contracts, driving sales revenue and formulating business/tender strategies. She obtained her Bachelor in Property & Construction from the University of Melbourne. Mr William Tan Kwang Hwee Lead Independent Director William is Group CFO of SGX Mainboard-listed Tiong Woon Corporation Holding. An MBA, qualified accountant and engineer by training, he was named Executive of the Year ‚Äì Construction & Materials at the Singapore Business Review Management Excellence Awards 2016. Mr Buhdy Bok Sin Swee Independent Director A seasoned leader with over 25 years of experience in the travel and tourism industry. Since 2018, Mr. Bok has served as the Managing Director of Mount Faber Leisure Group Pte. Ltd. Mr Chua Hock Thak Independent Director Chairman of Nomination Committee and member of the Audit and Remuneration Committee. He has some 40 years of experience in the development of water infrastructure projects with PUB, Singapore's National Water Agency. Mr Teo Ho Beng Non-Executive Director Executive Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Hiap Hoe Group. Mr Teo has more than 38 years of experience in the construction and property industries. Management Team Mr Toh Chew Leong Advisor One of the founders of the Group. Oversees the Group's asphalt premix plant and construction waste recycling plant and assists in the day to day operations. Mr Toh Swee Kim Advisor Oversees all operations for Underground Utilities Infrastructure construction and maintenance business. Has extensive experience of more than 20 years in pipe and cable laying business. Mr Toh Chew Chai Advisor Joined Ley Choon Group since its establishment. Oversees all operations for Underground Utilities Infrastructure construction and maintenance business. Mr Zhang Wei Qiang Chief Operating Officer Joined as Project Manager in 2019 and has taken on leadership roles across multiple key departments. Holds a Bachelor's Degree in Civil Engineering from China University of Mining and Technology and completed GMBA from Alliance Manchester Business School in December 2024. Dr Ou Zhiyong Head (Project Management Office, Big Pipe & Road Works) Appointed in 2024, responsible for tendering of projects and overseeing all project executions. Holds a PhD degree from the National University of Singapore in Civil Engineering. Mr Toh Kai Hock IT Director & Head of Fleet Department Joined the Group as IT Manager in 2011. Graduated with a Bachelor of Engineering (Electrical Engineering) First Class Honours from National University of Singapore. Mr Toh Kai Sheng, Adam Director, Operations & HR Joined the Group in 2009. Oversees Group HR and Administration. Graduated from NTU with a Bachelor of Accountancy with First Class Honours and is a Chartered Accountant of Singapore.
